dmca.title: [ABUSE] DMCA Violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), as it does not identify (a) the
copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed and (b) the material that is
claimed to be infringing, and information reasonably sufficient to permit
the The Planet to locate the said material. 

 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Thursday, February 23, 2006 2:38 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Violation]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] DMCA Violation
Date:         Thu, 23 Feb 2006 12:35:26 -0800
From:         Tault Admin <admin@tault.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>, <legal@theplanet.com>



*DMCA*

TaultUnleashed LLC
3337 Kendall Lane
Waco, TX, 76705
February 22, 2006


The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite #110
Dallas, TX 75207 US


Dear abuse@theplanet.com <mailto:abuse@theplanet.com>

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on
http://www.taultunleashed.com/phpbb2/index.php
Search Query: supremex.net
URL of Search Query: http://www.supremex.net/ Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.supremex.net/modules.php?name=Forums
All Forum Topics By the User admin / Administrator of the site are guides
directly posted word from word from our pay site. The topics contain
information that is directly stolen from the website www.taultunleashed.com.
They are being illegally taken and posted by this user with full knowledge
of violation of our companys intellectual rights.

My Contact Information: admin@tault.com

Infringer?s Contact Information:
Administrative Contact:
Blakkan, Cordell deezx69xnutz@yahoo.com
w3bbix Networks
2251 W 232nd
Torrance, California 90501
United States
3103265268

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described
above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification
is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,



Nicholas Teagarden, Vice President
TaultUnleashed LLC
Phone: 360-6240022
Email: admin@tault.com

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org
